location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no. 1657 of 1822 from the Secretary to the Government of Bombay to Lieutenant John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulph [Gulf]

mods.abstract: Informs MacLeod that the Civil Pay Master has been instructed to advance him of the amount of 8000 rupees for the purchase of furniture for the Residency and also discusses a suite of tents provided for Doctor Andrew Jukes, the Residency Surgeon, and in possession of Captain William Bruce, should be returned.
